alert.note: Alert for Harlan (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 28 at 2:59PM EDT until July 29 at 2:43AM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Jackson KY has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Kentucky... Cumberland River at Baxter affecting Harlan County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Cumberland River at Baxter. * WHEN...From this evening to just after midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, Low lying areas flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:00 PM EDT Thursday the stage was 15.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this evening to a crest of 16.5 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage this evening. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 16.6 feet on 03/29/1976. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. The next statement will be issued 8 PM EDT.
